text:
[Verse]
Sunsets glowing bright
Colors in the night
Dreams are taking flight
Fading out of sight

[Verse 2]
Whispers on the breeze
Dancing with the leaves
Moments that we seize
Feel the heart at ease

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we chase
Every smile we trace
Hearts in open space
In this magic place

[Verse 3]
Stars begin to shine
Holding hands in time
In this space divine
World is our design

[Bridge]
Light that starts to fade
New dreams being made
Fear starts to evade
In this twilight parade

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we chase
Every smile we trace
Hearts in open space
In this magic place
title: Sunset Dreams
